options.text: Ask About the Password to Fester's Crypt

nodes.text: You wouldn't by any chance know of the password to get inside the crypt in the Catacombs, would you?
Why, which crypt would that be?
How many crypts in the Catacombs need a password to enter?
Heh heh. I know of only one - Fester Edwin Savers. Yes, I do happen to know the correct password.
I would be more than happy to share this information with you for a nominal fee...
Since we are such good friends, I will only charge you ten Lyra for the password.
The password to Fester Savers' crypt is "Pesce Spada." I believe you will find that your money was well-spent for that information.

nodes.name: Password for the Fence
nodes.description: The password to get into Fester's crypt is "pesce spada." I'll keep that in mind.

nodes.text: I was only trying to help you.

options.text: Admit You Don't Have the Cash

nodes.text: I'm afraid I don't have the cash right now.
That is most unfortunate. Perhaps another time then.
You are such a fine fellow, Shawn. I will only charge you 35 Lyra for the information.
The password to Fester Savers' crypt is "Pesce Spada." I believe you will find that your money was well-spent for that information.

nodes.name: Password for the Fence
nodes.description: The password to get into Fester's crypt is "pesce spada." I'll keep that in mind.

nodes.text: Thirty-five Lyra for a password? No deal.
I was only trying to help you.

options.text: Admit You Don't Have the Cash

nodes.text: I'm afraid I don't have the cash right now.
That is most unfortunate. Perhaps another time then.
